In a message dated 5/26/00 4:38:24 PM Pacific Daylight Time, 
wilddance_mare@... writes:
(Still sounds like a crappy idea to me. I know the meaning to a powerful 
 character, and that's not the way to go. You're just going to write anything 
 you like, and confuse the heck out of everyone else. I don't watch 
 wrestling, so you will confuse me! Don't do that. You don't see me bringing 
 in a nighthorse from Rider at the Gate do ya? I like it, but I'm not 
 introducing them to the RP. Because they have no place in Beast Wars. Bots 
 wrestling, yeah right. Can we get back to the reality factor? >>

It's your choice Code, but its just a plainly dumb idea.  Kind of like if 
brought in a Mohammed Ali (the boxer) character.  Or if I brought in The 
Flash, Batman, or something else.  But, Talon, Cybertronians may wrestle for 
a sport, that hasn't been proved or disproved though.  But a pro wrestler 
wanna be has no place in the RPG.  This isn't an RPG on Cybertron's wrestling 
position or WWF, it's about a little place called Past Earth to decide the 
fate of Cybertron and Earth, and the galaxy, losing will cause Cybertron to 
be destroyed, the Decepticons ultimately dying out, after the Autobots are 
all but dead.  Earth nothing but a dry dust ball with no energy, or life.
